channel.title: Acacia's Note
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian
channel.dc:creator: Acacia Chen

item.title: AI and Disaster Management 人工智慧與災害管理
item.description:
Decadal average: Number of deaths from natural disasters, World: a graph showing the number of deaths caused by different types of disasters over decades.
十年平均值：世界自然災害死亡人數：顯示數十年來不同類型災害造成的死亡人數的圖表。

Artificial Intelligence for Disaster Risk Reduction: Opportunities, challenges, and prospects: information on the opportunities, challenges, and applications of artificial intelligence in disaster risk reduction, as discussed in a bulletin by the World Meteorological Organization (WMO).
人工智慧減少災害風險：機會、挑戰和前景：世界氣象組織 (WMO) 公報中討論的有關人工智慧在減少災害風險方面的機會、挑戰和應用的資訊。

Predicting Drought-Related Food Insecurity in Ethiopia: focuses on predicting drought-related food insecurity in Ethiopia and provides insights and resources related to this topic.
預測埃塞俄比亞與乾旱相關的糧食不安全：重點預測埃塞俄比亞與乾旱相關的糧食不安全，並提供與該主題相關的見解和資源。

Mapping global flood risk | One metre at a time: a story about mapping global flood risk and highlights the research impact in this area conducted by the University of Bristol.
繪製全球洪水風險圖|一次一米：關於繪製全球洪水風險圖並強調布里斯託大學在該領域進行的研究影響的故事。

Early Warning, Alert and Response System (EWARS): information about the Early Warning, Alert, and Response System (EWARS), which is a surveillance system used by the World Health Organization (WHO) to detect and respond to disease outbreaks and emergencies in real-time.
早期預警、警報和響應系統 (EWARS)：有關早期預警、警報和響應系統 (EWARS) 的信息，該系統是世界衛生組織 (WHO) 用於即時檢測和應對疾病爆發和緊急情況的監測系統。

Introducing Pano | Actionable Intelligence for Wildfire Management: a company specializing in artificial intelligence and computer vision technologies for wildfire management.
介紹帕諾 |野火管理的可行情報：一家專門​​從事野火管理人工智慧和電腦視覺技術的公司。

Research on Machine Learning for Disaster Response: what makes a good paper?: discusses research on machine learning for disaster response, exploring how machine learning techniques are being applied to improve emergency response and management during disasters.
災難應變機器學習研究：什麼是一篇好論文討論了機器學習在災難應變中的研究，探討如何應用機器學習技術來改善災難期間的緊急應變和管理。

From Big Data to Small Languages: communication and information processing in a newly connected world: These slides discuss how smarter language processing can help manage a disease outbreak.
從大數據到小語言：新互聯世界中的通訊和資訊處理：這些幻燈片討論了更聰明的語言處理如何幫助管理疾病爆發。

World Food Programme Landcruiser: an image of World Food Programme Landcruiser.
世界糧食計劃署陸地巡洋艦：世界糧食計畫署陸地巡洋艦的圖片。

5 Ways Data Scientists Can Help Respond to COVID-19 and 5 Actions to Avoid: discusses five ways in which data scientists can contribute to responding to the COVID-19 pandemic and highlights five actions that should be avoided in the process. It also provides insights and recommendations for data-driven approaches in tackling the challenges posed by COVID-19.
資料科學家協助應對 COVID-19 的 5 種方法以及應避免的 5 項行動 ：討論了資料科學家為應對 COVID-19 大流行做出貢獻的五種方式，並強調了在此過程中應避免的五種行為。它還為應對 COVID-19 帶來的挑戰的數據驅動方法提供了見解和建議。

Google Person Finder: the support page for Google Person Finder, a tool developed by Google to help people locate and provide information about individuals affected by a disaster or crisis. It provides assistance and resources for using the Person Finder tool effectively.
Google 尋人：Google Person Finder 的支援頁面，該工具由 Google 開發，可協助人們找到並提供受災難或危機影響的個人的資訊。它為有效使用人員查找工具提供協助和資源。

Microsoft AI for Humanitarian Action projects: The website highlights various AI for Humanitarian Action projects that leverage artificial intelligence to address global humanitarian challenges.
Microsoft AI 人道行動項目：該網站重點介紹了各種人工智慧促進人道主義行動項目，這些項目利用人工智慧來應對全球人道主義挑戰。

Artificial intelligence improves the energy efficiency of buildings: a website from the European cluster collaboration, in this report explaining about AI application in buildings.
人工智慧提高建築物的能源效率：來自歐洲集群協作的網站，在本報告中解釋了人工智慧在建築中的應用。

Microsoft’s Responsible AI Resource Center: A website that provides information about responsible AI practices, perspectives and resources.
Microsoft 的 Responsible AI 資源中心：提供有關負責任​​的人工智慧實踐、觀點和資源資訊的網站。

Microsoft’s Framework for Building AI Systems Responsibly: A website presenting a framework according to Microsoft's Responsible AI standard to guide how they build AI systems.
微軟負責任地建立人工智慧系統的框架：該網站展示了根據 Microsoft Responsible AI 標準的框架，以指導他們如何建立 AI 系統。

Meeting the AI Moment: A blog at Microsoft's website presenting thoughts and reflections about responsible AI.
迎接人工智慧時刻：微軟網站上的博客，介紹了有關負責任​​的人工智慧的想法和反思。

Three Critical Elements for Progress: A blog at Microsoft's website reflecting on their responsible AI program.
取得進展的三個關鍵要素：微軟網站上的部落格反映了他們負責任的人工智慧計畫。

AI Governance Whitepaper: A document from Microsoft providing a blueprint for AI Governance.
人工智慧治理白皮書：微軟的一份文檔，提供了人工智慧治理的藍圖。

Microsoft's AI Customer Commitments: A blog at Microsoft's website presenting their commitments related to AI Customers.
微軟的人工智慧客戶承諾 ：微軟網站上的部落格介紹了他們對人工智慧客戶的承諾。


Aerial Damage Assessment Following Hurricane Sandy: an after-action report for information processing following Hurricane Sandy. The authors, including Dr. Robert Munro, analyze the aerial damage assessment process in a number of ways, reporting the results and suggesting methods to ensure quality and reliability for similar responses to future events.
颶風桑迪後的空中損失評估：桑迪颶風後資訊處理的事後報告。包括羅伯特·蒙羅博士在內的作者以多種方式分析了空中損失評估過程，報告結果並提出方法，以確保對未來事件的類似響應的品質和可靠性。


Crowdsourcing and the crisis-affected community–Lessons learned and looking forward from Mission 4636: This article presents the first full report and analysis of the initiative, looking at the accuracy and timeliness of creating structured data from the messages and the collaborative nature of the process.
眾包和受危機影響的社區——從 4636的經驗教訓和展望：本文介紹了該計劃的第一份完整報告和分析，探討了從訊息創建結構化資料的準確性和及時性以及流程的協作性質。

Mission 4636: Information about an initiative launched in response to the Haiti earthquake 2010. It aimed to create a platform for emergency communication via SMS to assist disaster response and recovery efforts.
任務 4636：有關為應對 2010 年海地地震而發起的一項計劃的資訊。

Processing Short Message Communications in Low-Resource Languages: Dr. Robert Munro's Ph.D. Dissertation at Stanford University.
處理低資源語言的短訊息通訊：Robert Munro 博士的博士學位。史丹佛大學的論文。

Jungle Light Speed's website | Processing Short Message Communications in Low-Resource Languages: Dr. Robert Munro's Ph.D. Dissertation titled "Processing short-message communications in low-resource languages" explores the variation in short-message communications in different languages and investigates how modeling this variation can improve natural language processing systems, with a focus on text messaging as a linguistically diverse form of digital communication.
叢林光速網站|以低資源語言處理短訊息通訊：羅伯特·蒙羅博士的博士學位題為「處理低資源語言中的短消息通信」的論文探討了不同語言中短消息通信的變化，並研究了對這種變化進行建模如何改進自然語言處理系統，重點關注文本消息作為語言上多樣化的形式數位通訊。

Embracing AI to preserve dying languages: This article explores how artificial intelligence is being utilized to protect and revitalize endangered languages.
擁抱人工智慧以保護垂死的：本文探討如何利用人工智慧來保護和振興瀕危語言。

Haiti on the Rise: Non-profit organization founded by Jaqueline Oriscar Lee that is committed to supporting the people of Haiti in fostering sustainable impact through ongoing projects in education, reconstruction, healthcare, and pastoral endeavors.
崛起中的海地：由傑奎琳·奧里斯卡·李 (Jaqueline Oriscar Lee) 創立的非營利組織，致力於支持海地人民透過正在進行的教育、重建、醫療保健和田園活動項目促進永續影響。



Illegal Gold Mining in La Pampa and Tambopata National Reserve, Peru: An article on the Environmental Justice Atlas by Max Stoisser that examines the impact of illegal gold mining in Peru.
秘魯拉潘帕和坦博帕塔國家保護區的非法金礦開採：Max Stoisser 在環境正義地圖集上發表的一篇文章，研究了秘魯非法金礦開採的影響。

Machine learning can boost the value of wind energy: A research article from DeepMind that explains how Machine Learning algorithms can increase the value of wind energy
機器學習可以提高風能的價值：DeepMind 的一篇研究文章解釋了機器學習演算法如何增加風能的價值

United Nations Sustainable Development Goals: A website that provides information on the 17 Sustainable Development Goals adopted by the United Nations in 2015.
聯合國永續發展目標：提供聯合國 2015 年通過的 17 項永續發展目標資訊的網站。

AI for Everyone on Coursera: A course that provides a broad introduction to artificial intelligence and its applications.
Coursera 上面向所有人的人工智慧：一門課程，廣泛介紹人工智慧及其應用。

The Machine Learning Specialization on Coursera: A series of courses that cover the fundamentals of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and more.
Coursera 上的機器學習專業課程：一系列涵蓋機器學習基礎知識的課程，包括監督和無監督學習、深度學習等。

The Deep Learning Specialization on Coursera: A series of courses that provide an in-depth look at deep learning and its applications, including neural networks, convolutional networks, and recurrent networks.
Coursera 上的深度學習專業課程：一系列課程，深入介紹深度學習及其應用，包括神經網路、卷積網路和循環網路。

X Ray feature disentanglement: A github repository from Microsoft AI for Good Research Lab. This project is "Deep learning models for COVID-19 chest x-ray classification: Preventing shortcut learning using feature disentanglement".
X 射線特徵解開：來自 Microsoft AI for Good Research Lab 的 github 儲存庫。該項目是「用於 COVID-19 胸部 X 光分類的深度學習模型：使用特徵解纏來防止捷徑學習」。

Multi-species bioacoustic classification: A github repository from Microsoft AI for Good Research Lab. The main focus of this study was species of Greatest Conservation Need according to the State Wildlife Action Plan.
多物種生物聲學分類：來自 Microsoft AI for Good Research Lab 的 github 儲存庫。這項研究的主要重點是根據國家野生動物行動計畫最需要保護的物種。

Damage Assessment Visualizer: A github repository from Microsoft AI for Good Research Lab. This visualizer leverages satellite imagery from a disaster region to visualize conditions of building and structures before and after a disaster.
損壞評估視覺化工具：來自 Microsoft AI for Good Research Lab 的 github 儲存庫。此視覺化工具利用災區的衛星影像來視覺化災難前後的建築物和結構的狀況。

The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Storm Archive: A website that provides access to historical data on tropical storms and hurricanes.
美國國家海洋暨大氣總署 (NOAA) 風暴檔案：提供熱帶風暴和颶風歷史資料存取的網站。

Microsoft’s Responsible AI Resource Center: A website that provides information about responsible AI practices, perspectives and resources.
Microsoft 的 Responsible AI 資源中心：提供有關負責任​​的人工智慧實踐、觀點和資源資訊的網站。

Microsoft’s Framework for Building AI Systems Responsibly: A website presenting a framework according to Microsoft's Responsible AI standard to guide how they build AI systems.
微軟負責任地建立人工智慧系統的框架：該網站展示了根據 Microsoft Responsible AI 標準的框架，以指導他們如何建立 AI 系統。

Meeting the AI Moment: A blog at Microsoft's website presenting thoughts and reflections about responsible AI.
迎接人工智慧時刻：微軟網站上的博客，介紹了有關負責任​​的人工智慧的想法和反思。

Three Critical Elements for Progress: A blog at Microsoft's website reflecting on their responsible AI program.
取得進展的三個關鍵要素：微軟網站上的部落格反映了他們負責任的人工智慧計畫。

AI Governance Whitepaper: A document from Microsoft providing a blueprint for AI Governance.
人工智慧治理白皮書：微軟的一份文檔，提供了人工智慧治理的藍圖。

Microsoft's AI Customer Commitments: A blog at Microsoft's website presenting their commitments related to AI Customers.
微軟的人工智慧客戶承諾 ：微軟網站上的部落格介紹了他們對人工智慧客戶的承諾。


Mobile cellular subscriptions: A website from The World Bank containing data about the mobile cellular subscriptions worldwide, total subscribers (billions).
行動蜂窩：世界銀行的網站，包含有關全球行動蜂窩用戶的數據，用戶總數（十億）。

Classification Models for New Language Communities: Building Domain-Specific Message Categorization: A research paper that presents the U-Report, a social messaging tool, developed by UNICEF that allows people in developing countries to respond to polls, report issues, and become agents of positive change within in their communities.
新語言社群的分類模型：建立特定於網域的訊息分類：一篇研究論文介紹了 U-Report，這是由聯合國兒童基金會開發的社交資訊工具，使發展中國家的人們能夠回應民意調查、報告問題並成為社區內積極變革的推動者。

1000 Days: A website explaining about the "1000 Days" foundation that provides nutrition and healthcare for mothers and their children from pregnancy to 2 years old.
1000 天：介紹「1000天」基金會的網站，該基金會為母親及其孩子從懷孕到2歲提供營養和保健。

U-Report: A project from UNICEF. This website informs about U-Report which is a messaging tool that empowers young people around the world to engage with and speak out on issues that matter to them.
U 報告：聯合國兒童基金會的一個計畫。本網站提供有關U-Report的信息這是一種訊息傳遞工具，使世界各地的年輕人能夠參與並對對他們來說重要的問題發表意見。

Atlas of AI: A website about Kate Crawford's book "Atlas of AI: Power, Politics, and the Planetary Costs of Artificial Intelligence" which reveals how the global networks underpinning AI technology are damaging the environment, entrenching inequality, and fueling a shift toward undemocratic governance.
人工智慧圖集：關於凱特·克勞福德(Kate Crawford) 的書《人工智慧地圖集：人工智慧的權力、政治和行星成本》的網站，該書揭示了支撐人工智慧技術的全球網路如何破壞環境、加劇不平等並推動不民主治理的轉變。

Ghost work: A website about Gray and Suri's book "Ghost work" talking about the invisible human labor force.
幽靈工作：一個關於格雷和蘇瑞的書“幽靈工作”的網站，該書談論了無形的人類勞動力。

Improving conditions for data enrichment workers, Partnership on AI: A website containing Resources for AI Practitioners helping to improve conditions for data enrichment Workers.
改善數據豐富工作者的條件，人工智慧合作夥伴關係：一個包含人工智慧從業人員資源的網站，有助於改善資料豐富工作者的條件。

PurpleAir: It is a platform displaying air quality data. The PurpleAir system is composed of many sensors that are installed, controlled and maintained by members of the community.
PurpleAir：是一個展示空氣品質數據的平台。 PurpleAir 系統由許多感測器組成，由社區成員安裝、控制和維護。

Bogotá Air Quality Forecast Maps: A collection of maps that show the air quality forecast for Bogotá, Colombia.
波哥大空氣品質預報地圖：顯示哥倫比亞波哥大空氣品質預報的地圖集。

Air Quality Monitoring Network of Bogotá (Red de Monitoreo de Calidad del Aire de Bogotá - RMCAB): A website that provides information on air quality monitoring in Bogotá, Colombia.
波哥大空氣品質監測網路 (Red de Monitoreo de Calidad del Aire de Bogotá - RCAB)：提供哥倫比亞波哥大空氣品質監測資訊的網站。

Bogotá Air Quality Index and Health Risk (IBOCA): An interactive map that displays air pollution data and the Bogotá Air Quality Index.
波哥大空氣品質指數與健康風險（IBOCA） ：互動式地圖，顯示空氣污染數據和波哥大空氣品質指數。

Bogotá Air Quality Map from the Air Quality Monitoring Network of Bogotá (RMCAB): A map that shows the air quality in Bogotá, Colombia.  
波哥大空氣品質地圖來自波哥大空氣品質監測網 (RMCAB)） ：顯示哥倫比亞波哥大空氣品質的地圖。

Bogotá's New Collaborative Network of Microsensors Launch Video: A video that explains how the new network of microsensors will be used in Bogotá.  
波哥大的新微感測器協作網路發布影片：一段影片解釋如何在波哥大使用新的微型感測器網路。

Bogotá Government Air Plan 2030 (based on UN SDGs): A website that describes the city's plan to improve air quality and reduce emissions by 2030.
波哥大政府 2030 年空氣計畫（基於聯合國永續發展目標）：介紹該市到 2030 年改善空氣品質和減少排放的計畫的網站。


Bogotá Air Quality Forecast Maps: A collection of maps that show the air quality forecast for Bogotá, Colombia.
波哥大空氣品質預報地圖：顯示哥倫比亞波哥大空氣品質預報的地圖集。

Air Quality Monitoring Network of Bogotá (Red de Monitoreo de Calidad del Aire de Bogotá - RMCAB): A website that provides information on air quality monitoring in Bogotá, Colombia.
波哥大空氣品質監測網路 (Red de Monitoreo de Calidad del Aire de Bogotá - RCAB)：提供哥倫比亞波哥大空氣品質監測資訊的網站。

Bogotá Air Quality Index and Health Risk (IBOCA): An interactive map that displays air pollution data and the Bogotá Air Quality Index.
波哥大空氣品質指數與健康風險（IBOCA） ：互動式地圖，顯示空氣污染數據和波哥大空氣品質指數。

Bogotá Air Quality Map from the Air Quality Monitoring Network of Bogotá (RMCAB): A map that shows the air quality in Bogotá, Colombia.  
波哥大空氣品質地圖來自波哥大空氣品質監測網 (RMCAB)） ：顯示哥倫比亞波哥大空氣品質的地圖。

Bogotá's New Collaborative Network of Microsensors Launch Video: A video that explains how the new network of microsensors will be used in Bogotá.  
波哥大的新微感測器協作網路發布影片：一段影片解釋如何在波哥大使用新的微型感測器網路。

Bogotá Government Air Plan 2030 (based on UN SDGs): A website that describes the city's plan to improve air quality and reduce emissions by 2030.
波哥大政府 2030 年空氣計畫（基於聯合國永續發展目標）：介紹該市到 2030 年改善空氣品質和減少排放的計畫的網站。

You don't have to be an expert to solve big problems, TED Talk: Tapiwa's TED talk about how he and his colleagues developed a platform that uncovers trends in pollution and helps city planners make better decisions.
你不必成為專家才能解決大問題，TED 演講：Tapiwa 的 TED 演講講述了他和同事如何開發一個平台來揭示污染趨勢並幫助城市規劃者做出更好的決策。



Tracking the Changing Climate with Earth Observations | Met Office - Climate Dashboard: a website presenting dashboards which gathers together the key indicators of climate change.
透過地球觀測追蹤氣候變遷 |英國氣象局 - 氣候儀表板：一個展示儀表板的網站，其中收集了氣候變遷的關鍵指標。

Energy Transitions: Global and National Perspectives (Second expanded and updated edition): a website about the book "Energy Transitions" providing a detailed, global examination of energy transitions and supplying a long-term historical perspective.
能源轉型：全球和國家視角（第二擴展和更新版）：有關“能源轉型”一書的網站，提供對能源轉型的詳細的全球審查並提供長期的歷史視角。

Trends in Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide: Global Monitoring Laboratory - NOAA's official website reporting trends in the atmospheric carbon dioxide.
大氣二氧化碳的趨勢：全球監測實驗室 - NOAA 的官方網站，報告大氣中二氧化碳的趨勢。

Why Does CO2 get Most of the Attention When There are so Many Other Heat-Trapping Gasses?: a website from the Union of Concerned Scientists reporting about climate change.
當存在如此多的其他吸熱氣體時，為什麼二氧化碳最受關注？：憂思科學家聯盟的一個網站，報告氣候變遷。

Global Temperature Anomalies from 1880 to 2021: NASA's website for the section Scientific Visualization Studio.
1880 年至 2021 年全球溫度：NASA 網站上的科學視覺化工作室部分。

NASA GSFC MASCON Solution over Antarctica from Jan 2004 - Jun 2014: NASA's website for the section Scientific Visualization Studio explaining the Antarctic Mass Change.
2004 年 1 月至 2014 年 6 月期間 NASA GSFC MASCON 南極解決方案：NASA 網站上的科學視覺化工作室部分解釋了南極質量變化。

Devastating Floods in Pakistan: a website from NASA Earth Observatory exploring through times the floods in Pakistan.
巴基斯坦毀滅性洪水 在：美國太空總署地球觀測站的網站，探索巴基斯坦洪水的歷史時期。

Atmospheric CO2 vs. global temperature change and climate conference dates, 1958-2020: a blogpost explaining the trains in the atmospheric CO vs global temperature change.
大氣二氧化碳與全球溫度變化和氣候會議日期，1958-2020：一篇部落格文章解釋了大氣中二氧化碳與全球溫度變化的關係。

Special Report: Global Warming of 1.5 ºC (Glossary): a website about defining terms about climate change.
特別報告：全球暖化 1.5 ℃（術語表）：一個關於定義氣候變遷術語的網站。

How close are we passing 15 degrees celsius global warming?: an article from Reuters reporting about global warming.
全球暖化距離超過攝氏 15 度還有多遠？：路透社報道全球暖化的一篇文章。

Climate Action Tracker: a website about the Climate Action Tracker (CAT) is an independent scientific analysis, tracking government climate action and measures it against the globally agreed Paris Agreement.
氣候行動追蹤器：有關氣候行動追蹤器 (CAT) 的網站是一個獨立的科學分析機構，追蹤政府的氣候行動並根據全球商定的《巴黎協定》對其進行衡量。

Artificial intelligence improves the energy efficiency of buildings: a website from the European cluster collaboration, in this report explaining about AI application in buildings.
人工智慧提高建築物的能源效率：來自歐洲集群協作的網站，在本報告中解釋了人工智慧在建築中的應用。

Microsoft’s Responsible AI Resource Center: A website that provides information about responsible AI practices, perspectives and resources.
Microsoft 的 Responsible AI 資源中心：提供有關負責任​​的人工智慧實踐、觀點和資源資訊的網站。

Microsoft’s Framework for Building AI Systems Responsibly: A website presenting a framework according to Microsoft's Responsible AI standard to guide how they build AI systems.
微軟負責任地建立人工智慧系統的框架：該網站展示了根據 Microsoft Responsible AI 標準的框架，以指導他們如何建立 AI 系統。

Meeting the AI Moment: A blog at Microsoft's website presenting thoughts and reflections about responsible AI.
迎接人工智慧時刻：微軟網站上的博客，介紹了有關負責任​​的人工智慧的想法和反思。

Three Critical Elements for Progress: A blog at Microsoft's website reflecting on their responsible AI program.
取得進展的三個關鍵要素：微軟網站上的部落格反映了他們負責任的人工智慧計畫。

AI Governance Whitepaper: A document from Microsoft providing a blueprint for AI Governance.
人工智慧治理白皮書：微軟的一份文檔，提供了人工智慧治理的藍圖。

Microsoft's AI Customer Commitments: A blog at Microsoft's website presenting their commitments related to AI Customers.
微軟的人工智慧客戶承諾 ：微軟網站上的部落格介紹了他們對人工智慧客戶的承諾。


Machine learning can boost the value of wind energy: a blog from DeepMind exploring the uses of machine learning in addressing projects related to energy.
機器學習可以提高風能的價值：來自 DeepMind 的博客，探討機器學習在解決與能源相關的項目中的用途。

Baidu KDD CUP 2022: a website from Baidu, the AI Studio, explaining all the information for the Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Cup in 2016.
百度 KDD CUP 2022：百度AI工作室網站，解釋了2016年知識發現與資料探勘杯的所有資訊。

Open Climate Fix: a website from the non-profit Open Climate Fix which is a product lab totally focused on reducing greenhouse gas emissions as rapidly as possible.
打開氣候修復：非營利組織 Open Climate Fix 的網站，該組織是一個完全專注於盡快減少溫室氣體排放的產品實驗室。
Machine learning can boost the value of wind energy


Accelerated modern human–induced species losses: Entering the sixth mass extinction: a paper explaining the rise in extinction rates.
現代人類導致的物種滅絕加速：進入第六次大規模：一篇解釋滅絕率上升的論文。

Biodiversity redistribution under climate change: Impacts on ecosystems and human well-being: a paper about the impact of climate change.
氣候變遷下的生物多樣性分配：對生態系統和人類福祉的影響：一篇關於氣候變遷影響的論文。

Biodiversity - our strongest natural defense against climate change: a report from the United Nations related to climate change.
生物多樣性 - 我們應對氣候變遷最強大的自然防禦：聯合國有關氣候變遷的報告。

A climate risk index for marine life: a paper about climate change impacting virtually all marine life.
海洋生物的氣候風險指數：一篇關於氣候變遷影響幾乎所有海洋生物的論文。

Tracking Amazon Deforestation from Above: a website from the NASA's earth observatory with visuals and information about the amazon deforestation.
從上方追蹤亞馬遜森林砍伐情況：美國太空總署地球觀測站的網站，提供有關亞馬遜森林砍伐的視覺效果和資訊。

Sentinel-2 captures coral bleaching of Great Barrier Reef: a website from ESA (the European Space Agency) explaining about the project Sentinel-2.
Sentinel-2大堡礁的珊瑚白化現象：ESA（歐洲太空總署）的網站解釋了 Sentinel-2 計畫。

Google Earth Engine: a website with zoomable video that allows to see how the earth has changed since 1984.
Google 地球引擎：一個帶有可縮放影片的網站，可以讓您了解自 1984 年以來地球發生了怎樣的變化。

iNaturalist: a website that helps identify the plants and animals around anyone, allowing people around the world to collect and contribute with this information.
iNaturalist：一個幫助識別任何人周圍的植物和動物的網站，允許世界各地的人們收集和貢獻這些資訊。

Florida Wildlife Camera Trap Dataset: a website from the University of Central Florida within its Center for Research in Computer Vision sharing dataset about Florida wildlife.
佛羅裡達野生動物相機陷阱資料集：中佛羅裡達大學電腦視覺研究中心的一個網站，分享有關佛羅裡達州野生動物的資料集。

Measuring the biodiversity of microbial communities by flow cytometry: a paper about methods in ecology.
透過流式細胞儀測量微生物群落的生物多樣性：一篇關於生態學方法的論文。

Is Global Microbial Biodiversity Increasing, Decreasing, or Staying the Same?: a paper from Frontiers in Ecology and Evolution.
全球微生物生物多樣性是增加、減少還是不變？：生態學與演化前沿的一篇論文。

Snapshot Safari: A large-scale collaborative to monitor Africa’s remarkable biodiversity: a paper from the South African journal of science.
Snapshot Safari：監控非洲卓越生物多樣性的大型合作計畫：南非科學雜誌的一篇論文。


Microsoft :Camara Traps Project: MegaDetector: link to the oficial repository to learn and explore more about the MegaDetector.
微軟：Camara Traps 專案：MegaDetector：連結到官方儲存庫以了解和探索有關 MegaDetector 的更多資訊。

Anecdotes from 11 Role Models in Machine Learning: a blog post, in KD Nuggets, from Robert Munro.
機器中 11 個角色模型的軼事：Robert Munro 在 KD Nuggets 上發表的一篇部落格文章。

Convolutional Deep Belief Networks for Scalable Unsupervised Learning of Hierarchical Representations: a paper presenting the convolutional deep belief network.
用於分層可擴展無監督學習的捲積深度置信網絡：一篇介紹卷積深度信念網路的論文。

item.title: 托福聽力
item.description:
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->I'm supposed to do a literature review for my psychology course, but I'm havin’ a hard time finding articles.I don't even know where to start looking. [frustrated]
学生：我想写一篇关于心理学课程的文学评论，但是我在找文章的时候遇到了困难。甚至我都不知道应该从哪开始找起。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->You said this is for your psychology course, right? So your focus is on... [anticipating interruption]
图书管理员：给心理学课程做准备，是吧？所以，你把重点放在……
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Dream Interpretation.
学生：释梦/ 梦的解析。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->Well, you have a focus, so that's already a good start.Hmmm... well, there're a few things... oh wait... have you checked to see if your professor put any materials for you to look at on reserve?
图书管理员：行，你有一个重点，这算是一个很好的开始。嗯...好，有这么几件事... ...哦，等等... ...你有没有检查看教授是否给你预留了学习资料？
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Uh-huh. [ yes] That’s one thing I did know to do. I just copied an article, but I still need three more on my topic from three different journals.
学生：啊哈，这是我知道自己该做的唯一一件事。我刚刚复印了一篇文章，但我还需要从三个不同的期刊里找出三篇关于我主题的文章。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->Let’s get you goin’ on looking for those, then.We have printed versions of 20 or so psychology journals in the reference section—these are ones published within the last year.Now that I think about it... there's a journal named Sleep and Dreams...
图书管理员：那就让我们一块找这三篇文章呗。在“参考书库区”，我们已经印刷过二十种版本的心理学期刊，这些都是去年一年内发行的。此外，我想想看... ...（貌似）有一份名为《睡眠与梦》的期刊。
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Yeah [overlap], the article I just copied is from that journal, so I’ve gotta look in other sources.
学生：哦，是的，我刚才复印的一篇文章就来自那本期刊，所以我得看看其他资料来源。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->OK. Actually, most of our material’s available electronically now.You can access psychology databases or electronic journals and articles through the library's computers.And if you wanted to search by title with the word “dream” for example, just type it in and all the articles with “dream” in the title will come up on the screen.
图书管理员：好的，其实，我们的大部分资料都是在网络上可用的。你可以通过图书馆的电脑接触到心理学数据库或相关电子期刊和文章。同时，如果你想通过搜索标题关键字，如“梦”一词，输入该词，所有包含“梦”一词的文章将都出现在屏幕上。
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Cool. That’s great. Too bad I can’t do this from home. [slightly under the breath]
学生：哇，太好了！哎呀，要是在家里也能这样做就好了。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->But you can. All of the library's databases and electronic sources can be accessed through any computer connected to the university network.
图书管理员：在家也可以的。连接学校网络的任何一台电脑，都可以用来登入图书馆数据库和电子资源库。
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Really?! I can't believe I didn't know that.It still sounds like it’s gonna take a while though, you know, going through all of that information--all of those sources.
学生：真哒？！我居然不知道这回事！看来得花点时间来搜索所有的这些信息和数据。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->Maybe, but you already narrowed your search down to articles on dream interpretation, so it shouldn’t be too bad.And, you probably noticed that there’s an abstract--or summary--at the top of the first page of the article you copied.When you do go into the databases and electronic sources, you have the option to display the abstracts on the computer screen. Skimming those to decide whether or not you wanna read the whole article should cut down some time.
图书管理员：也许吧，但你已经把搜索范围缩小到关于“释梦”的文章，所以应该不会花太长时间的。你可能也已经注意到（一个问题）：在你复印的那篇文章第一页的顶部有一个摘要。当你进入了数据库和电子资源库，你可以选择性的去点开阅读电脑屏幕上文章摘要，然后通过跳读来选择你想读的文章，这可以节省时间。
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Right…abstracts. They will definitely make the project more doable.I guess I should try out the electronic search while I'm still here, then. Ya know, just in case…
学生：对，摘要！浏览摘要肯定能让我更好地做这个课题。我想我应该在离开图书馆之前，尝试下电子搜索，以防我不会弄。
<-MALE LIBRARIAN:->Sure. Uh…that computer’s free over there. And I’ll be here ‘til five this afternoon.
图书管理员：有道理，呃... ...那边那台电脑没人用，还有我今天下午五点前人都会在这里。
<-FEMALE STUDENT:->Thanks, I feel a lot better about this assignment now.
学生：谢谢，对于这次作业我现在放心多了。
Why does the student go to see the librarian? 
A. To sign up for a seminar on using electronic sources for research
B. To report that a journal is missing from the reference area
C. To find out the procedure for checking out journal articles
D. To ask about how to look for resources for a class paper
What does the librarian say about the availability of journals and articles in the library? 
A. They are not easy to find if a professor put them on reserve
B. Most of them are accessible in an electronic format
C. Most of them can be checked out for three weeks
D. Printed versions from the past three years are located in the reference section.
What does the librarian suggest the student should do to save time? 
A. Choose an easier research topic
B. Concentrate on five journals
C. Read the summaries of the articles first
D. Install a new program on her home computer
What can be inferred about why the woman decides to use the computer in the library? 
A. She thinks she might need additional help from the man
B. She does not have a computer at home
C. She has to hand in her assignment by the end of the day
D. She will be meeting a friend in the library later on
Why does the woman say this “I can’t believe I didn’t know that"
A. She had forgotten about the information
B. She is surprised she was not aware of the information
C. She is annoyed that the information was published only recently
D. She is concerned that the librarian gave her incorrect information

item.title: 碩士兩年計畫
item.description:
規劃各種出國的機會！清楚描繪未來的畫像，確定自己想做什麼！

考高普考，目標這次一定要考上。
上專題討論兩個學期。
可以考慮學分課程：暑假可能想上的課程

目標GPA 4.0以上
盡量每科都4.3
抵免：3學分 灌溉排水工程
每個學期都有：
碩士論文
書報閱讀
專題討論

（考慮到跟博士申請有關得課程）
13學分（只要是高年級課程）：
生工系的課 3
機器學習相關？
實務方面的課？
IPCS  5~6
趙博的淨零？ 3
中文寫作課 3
論文寫作 
政策相關 2
英文寫作課 3 
不包含在畢業的課程
日文二上二下
德文二上二下


史丹佛暑期實習
SDSS Summer Internship Program - summer internships in sustainability | Stanford Doerr School of Sustainability
PICS 蠻有趣的，二月可能會公布實習的機會
Careers | Pacific Institute for Climate Solutions
找工作的網站，上面有很多美國的實習
500+ Climate Change Intern Jobs, Employment October 16, 2024| Indeed.com
找氣候變遷相關工作的網站
Climate Change Jobs, Organizations, Careers and Internships
馬德里大學暑期課程
Climate Change Summer School - A Multidisciplinary Approach
聯合國夏季學院
The UN Summer Academy: Join an Exceptional Group of Changemakers | UNSSC | United Nations System Staff College
芬蘭暑期學校12月報名6月上課，不過要是碩士生
Summer School 2025 | CNESS - Climate Neutral Energy Systems and Society | Tampere Universities
item.dc:creator: Acacia Chen

item.title: 學習資源整理
item.description:
EMT-1 初級緊急救護學習筆記
中華民國紅十字會--防災士培訓

【音樂好麻吉 24】搖滾樂風格：23 種 Rock 的曲風分支 - Blues-Feng 藍調風
【博物之島新訊】行動！Museum For Future：德國博物館協會2023年會報導 – 中華民國博物館學會
老派博粉 | 典藏ARTouch.com

N5文法32【助詞篇】「で」解析篇-時雨の町
OJAD - 韻律読み上げチュータ スズキクン

台灣人學廣東話的最快方法 | 廣東話普及學院
A Chinese-Cantonese Syllabary - 黃錫凌《粵音韻彙》電子版

學校裡面的
German : General Languages : Universität Hamburg
不確定是免費或是85歐元
希望可以上學期開始前的a1.1 跟上學期的a1.2
Willkommen bei der VHS Hamburg! | Hamburger Volkshochschule
漢堡成人教育機構，可以去那邊找一些免費的課程
Teilnehmende mit geringen Deutschkenntnissen | Hamburger Volkshochschule
給德文程度較差的
可以考慮去做飯的課程、語言課程以及瑜伽課程（可以語言不好）、書法課程（老師會講中文）。
Kurse für Studenten & Azubis | Hamburger Volkshochschule
給學生的
Classes : University Language Center : Universität Hamburg
學校裡面的語言中心，好像是免費，但是各種課程都要B1程度
歌德學院之類的都好貴，大概一個級別1000歐元。
【線上德文課程推薦】真的領到 Lingoda Sprint 的 100% 現金退款 – April Yang
之後回國可以考慮
一次通過四科歌德德檢 B1 準備、考題架構與心得分享. 2019 年底幸運考取 A1… | by 進貢仔日常 | Medium

Learn German Online - Hamburg Welcome Center
Sprache und Macht im Alltag - DemokratieWEBstatt.at
Deutsch im Alltag | Deutsch perfekt

初学者
